rewards.description: Pay for flights, hotels and car rentals with American Express® Travel the way you want – using your points, Card or a combination of both.

rewards.conversion_rate: 40,000 points Canada/US long haul flight and more…
rewards.description: You can use your Membership Rewards® points to book flights within Canada or to anywhere in the world for a fixed number of points. The number of points will stay the same regardless of flight availability, time of year or popularity of the flight.
Cover your fight with points directly at checkout on AirCanada.com using points for the total or part of your order. The minimum redemption requirement is 10 points.
Enjoy more ways to travel the world. You can transfer your Membership Rewards points to a third-party points program, like your favourite partner airline and hotel loyalty programs.
Save on millions of items when you use your points to pay for the total or part of your order at Amazon.ca.

rewards.program: Pay with Points at checkout with PayPal
rewards.description: Use your points at thousands of online stores when you check out with PayPal. Just link your Membership Rewards account to your PayPal account.
You can redeem for a wide range of leading products.
You can redeem your points for statement credits against any eligible purchases charged to your Card. The minimum redemption requirement is 1,000 points.
You can redeem for gift cards from your favourite brands, including American Express Prepaid Cards.
You can choose to donate your points to select charities and causes. A minimum of 1,000 Membership Rewards points is required to be redeemed for a $10 charitable donation.
